external_references.description: Mac Threat Response, Mobile Research Team. (2020, August 13). The XCSSET Malware: Inserts Malicious Code Into Xcode Projects, Performs UXSS Backdoor Planting in Safari, and Leverages Two Zero-day Exploits. Retrieved October 5, 2021.

objects.description: [XCSSET](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0658) performs AES-CBC encryption on files under ~/Documents, ~/Downloads, and ~/Desktop with a fixed key and renames files to give them a .enc extension. Only files with sizes less than 500MB are encrypted.(Citation: trendmicro xcsset xcode project 2020)
